## base namespace

## Abstract Classes

| Abstract Class                                                                         | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [AnyMatcher](./test-equivalence-matchers.base.anymatcher.md)                           | The base class for all Test Equivalence Matchers. Extend this if you don't have an example in your Matcher. Otherwise, use [base.AnyMatcherWithExample](./test-equivalence-matchers.base.anymatcherwithexample.md)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [AnyMatcherWithExample](./test-equivalence-matchers.base.anymatcherwithexample.md)     | The base class for all Test Equivalence Matchers that have examples provided. Extend this if your matcher knows what the example will be. Otherwise, use [base.AnyMatcher](./test-equivalence-matchers.base.anymatcher.md)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [CascadingContextMatcher](./test-equivalence-matchers.base.cascadingcontextmatcher.md) | <p>This is a passthrough matcher that does nothing except call the child matcher with the current actual data.</p><p>It's useful for taking advantage of the context cascading available on all matchers without needing to write you own matcher. Extend it if you want to make a matcher that only changes the context object. If you don't know what this means, you don't need to extend this matcher.</p><p>Due to limitations with JSii, extending implementations MUST NOT override <code>toJSON</code>, or MUST return the result of <code>super.toJSON()</code> as part of their toJSON method.</p> |
